message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your offer, but I can't go lower than $135. I believe this product will really benefit you.
I'm still interested in the product, but I can only go up to $115.
